.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HtmlControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor
Public MustInherit Class HtmlControl Inherits Control Implements IAttributeAccessor
public ref class HtmlControl abstract : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IAttributeAccessor
type HtmlControl = class inherit Control interface IAttributeAccessor

summary.span: 定义 ASP.NET 页框架中的所有 HTML 服务器控件通用的方法、属性和事件。

span.span: Defines the methods, properties, and events common to all HTML server controls in the ASP.NET page framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供由所有 HTML 服务器控件类继承的公共属性。The class provides common properties inherited by all HTML server control classes. 不会直接创建类的新实例。A new instance of the class is not created directly.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于使用默认值创建和初始化类的新实例 。This constructor is used to create and initialize a new instance of the class using default values. > [!NOTE] > 不会直接创建此类的新实例。A new instance of this class is not created directly. 此构造函数是从其他 HTML 控件类的构造函数调用的，用于初始化此类中定义的属性。This constructor is called from the constructor of other HTML control classes to initialize properties defined in this class. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Span" 文本字符串。The "span" literal string.|

summary.span: 获取在 ASP.NET 页内的服务器控件标记上表示的所有特性名称和值对的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all attribute name and value pairs expressed on a server control tag within the ASP.NET page.

value.span: 对象，它包含网页内的服务器控件标记上表示的所有特性名称和值对。

span.span: A object that contains all attribute name and value pairs expressed on a server control tag within the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性以编程方式访问 HTML 服务器控件的属性。Use this property to programmatically access the attributes of the HTML server control. 所有 HTML 服务器控件都将其特性存储在 属性中。All HTML server controls store their attributes in the property. HTML 特性由 .NET Framework 视为它们所属的 HTML 服务器控件的属性。HTML attributes are treated by the .NET Framework as properties on the HTML server control to which they belong. 有关特性集合的其他信息，请参见 类。For additional information on the attributes collection, see the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定控件的特性 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the attributes of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlControl.Attributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlControl.Attributes Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlControl.Attributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlControl.Attributes Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 创建一个新 对象来保存服务器控件的子控件（包括文本控件和服务器控件）。

span.span: Creates a new object to hold the child controls (both literal and server) of the server control.

returns.span: 一个 对象，用于包含当前服务器控件的子服务器控件。

span.span: A object to contain the current server control's child server controls.

member this.Disabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 HTML 服务器控件是否被禁用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the HTML server control is disabled.

value.span: 如果该控件被禁用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is disabled; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在浏览器中，禁用的元素或控件是只读的，并且具有以下增加的限制：其值不会随窗体一起提交，元素或控件无法接收焦点，并且通过按 tab 键导航文档时将跳过该元素或控件。In the browser, a disabled element or control is read-only, with the following added restrictions: its value is not submitted with the form, the element or control cannot receive focus, and the element or control is skipped when navigating the document by tabbing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式启用和禁用 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically enable and disable an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlControl.Disabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlControl.Disabled Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlControl.Disabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlControl.Disabled Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The name of the attribute.
This argument is case-insensitive.

summary.span: 获取 控件上的命名特性的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the named attribute on the control.

returns.span: 元素中此特性 形式的值。

span.span: The value of this attribute on the element, as a value.

returns.span: 如果此元素中不存在指定的特性，则返回一个空字符串 ("")。

span.span: If the specified attribute does not exist on this element, returns an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可访问服务器控件上的属性 。Use the method to access an attribute on the server control. 所有 HTML 服务器控件都将其特性存储在 属性中。All HTML server controls store their attributes in the property. HTML 特性由 ASP.NET 页框架作为它们所属的 HTML 服务器控件上的属性进行处理。HTML attributes are treated by the ASP.NET page framework as properties on the HTML server control to which they belong. 此 方法的 `name` 参数不区分大小写。The method's `name` parameter is case-insensitive.

summary.span: 获取应用于 ASP.NET 文件中指定的 HTML 服务器控件的所有级联样式表 (CSS) 属性的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all cascading style sheet (CSS) properties applied to a specified HTML server control in the ASP.NET file.

value.span: 对象，它包含 HTML 服务器控件的样式属性。

span.span: A object that contains the style properties for the HTML server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性以编程方式访问 HTML 服务器控件的样式属性。Use this property to programmatically access the style properties of the HTML server control. 有关 CSS 样式集合的其他信息，请参见 类。For additional information on the CSS style collection, see the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定控件的样式属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the style properties of an control. summary.span: 获取包含 特性和值对的标记的元素名。

The element name of the specified tag.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此属性以编程方式确定 HTML 服务器控件的元素名称。Use this property to programmatically determine the element name of the HTML server control. 例如， 服务器端元素的属性 `
` 包含值 "div"。For example, the property of the server-side `
` element contains the value "div". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式确定标记的元素名称。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically determine the element name of a tag. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlControl.TagName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlControl.TagName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlControl.TagName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlControl.TagName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property ViewStateIgnoresCase As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool ViewStateIgnoresCase { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 视图状态是否区分大小写。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the view state is case-sensitive.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写基类的 属性以始终返回，这 `true` 指示从保存视图状态继承的控件， 而不考虑大小写。The property overrides the base class's property to always return `true`, indicating that the controls that inherit from save view state without taking case into account.
